# Table Issues

Unaligned table:

| Name | Age | City |
|---|---|---|
| Alice | 30 | New York |
| Bob | 25 | Los Angeles |
| Charlie | 35 | Chicago |

Missing outer pipes:

Name | Age | City
|---|---|---|
David | 28 | Boston
Eve | 32 | Seattle

Inconsistent column widths:

| A | Very Long Column Name | C |
|---|---|---|
| Short | Data | X |
| Y | More Data Here | Z |
